Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30842436] Gram-positive bacteria:MRSP C22963(MIC=2-4 µg/ml), MSSA ATCC 29213(MIC=32-64 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC= 8 µg/ml)

Literature.Title: Characterization, mechanism of action and optimization of activity of a novel peptide-peptoid hybrid against bacterial pathogens involved in canine skin infections
Literature.Author: Ines Greco, Agnete Plahn Emborg, Bimal Jana, Natalia Molchanova, Alberto Oddo, Peter Damborg, Luca Guardabassi, Paul R. Hansen
